g-0: ^You're riding ur cool ass bike through a cool ass future city.
^The display on the bike lights up, your coordinator pops onto the screen.
^: Yo Vervian, the delivery goin alright so far?
^: Yeah, seems like I'll arrive on time. Traffic in the city ain't too bad today.
^: Alright good, we got a good streak going with on time deliveries, let's try not to break it!
^You pull up to a red light.

c-1: ^, you see a lineup of cars behind you.

g-1: ^The light turns green and you go racing off, weaving in and out of traffic, dodging the cars all slick and shit.
^: I see your GPS location, you better not be driving in between traffic as you often do.
^: Uhhh.... nooooooo, like I said traffic is just light today!
^The client ain't pay nothin for moves like these.
^But as you cruise through the streets of Neo-Avalon, you realize...

c-2: ^, and you notice a suspicious black car following you.

g-2: ^: Yo Amst, there someone sus on my tail... What you think I should do about it?
^: Hmmm, let me run some calculations on alternative waypoints....
^: Alright, you can either turn around if you wanna stay on the main roads...
^: OR there's an alleyway coming up on your right, through those backstreets it should be easy to out maneuver whoever may be following you.
^Turn around, or turn into the alley?
^Do a U-turn, and find another way around

c-3: ^You hit the brakes, and drift your bike around into the next lane.
^You floor the gas and pass the car.
^However, when you look into your mirror, you see the black car has turned around as well!
^And it's hot on your tail now!
c-4: ^: Alright, turn right into that alley, it should be too big for the car, but you should be able to squeeze through it!
^ said, you turn into the tight little alley.
^There are people in the alley selling their.... wares.... but you narrowly dodge them so you don't run them over.
^However, the car has found a way around!

g-3: ^: Ahh! They're still on my back! They must be after the package!
^: Damn! Uhh I guess you gotta try and out run 'em!
^You drive your bike through the streets.

c-5: ^You slow down and stop at the glowing red light.
^Surprisingly though, the black car ALSO stops...
^Both of you wait for the green to hit, as if it was a race about to start
^Both of you floor it and the chase is back on!
^The black car is still hot on your tail though...
c-6: ^You accelerate the bike to try to make it through. The traffic camera flashes as it takes your picture.
^So much for a clean driving record...
^However it does buy you a bit of time, the black car behind you couldn't make it through as smoothly as you did.
